items.q: How do I request a booking?
items.a: Fill the request form and we will confirm by email/phone.
Yes — kids ski and snowboard sets are available (subject to confirmation).

items.q: What should I include in the notes?
items.a: Shoe size, height/weight, skill level, and any preferences.

items.q: Can one person book for a family?
items.a: Yes — add multiple items in the request form.
Not listed yet. Contact us and we’ll see what we can arrange.
